author: ai
content:
Welcome 🤗! Ask me for a full character, Description layout (Or description) Personality, Name, Etc. 😊 
If you are choosing a character, choose a theme!

Example: Action, romance, Comedy, spy, Kidnapping, Futuristic, Historical, fantasy, Magical, Etc.

If you need help with one of your characters intro, I could try and make one! 🧩 
Enjoy! ☺️
